name: pupkinTD
description:
A common defense game but here to build the towers you need to use your own blood But be careful when you do this your castle also loses life. You need to sacrifice yourself for the good of the Castle But if you do this too many times you could end up running out of life =(

This is the first development release and my first participation in a Jam so don't expect anything too badass

----Towers---

 - Leaves a magic tower on the ground when killed -Leave a wall on the floor when killed -Remove towers when killed  -Leaves thorns in the ground when killed - leaves a pumpkin tower when killed

----controls---

Wasd = walk 

Q = sacrifice yourself
